column4: Ok all you smart Ubuntu people, is there any particular reason why my Wifi is not getting anywhere NEAR it's speed that it should?.. Maxing at 50Kbps, when I should atle ast average 150Kbps, and max at 220Kbps, on my 1.5Mbps Connection.
